ygData.subject: New server, hehe, all start afresh ;)
ygData.msgSnippet: The following has been posted to the patch server: To accommodate the increased number of players, we will be bringing a new server on-line. The server will be
ygData.messageBody:
The following has been posted to the patch server:
To accommodate the increased number of players, we will be bringing a new
server on-line. The server will be of the standard type, not unique, such
as the Rallos Zek (PvP) server. We estimate that it should be up and
running by either late Monday or Tuesday of next week. The name of the new
server will be released on Monday.
- The EverQuest Team
